org.cloudbus.cloudsim

Class Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Log

  • public class Log
extends Object
    The Log class used for performing loggin of the simulation process. It provides the ability to substitute the output stream by any OutputStream subclass.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 2.0
    Author:
    Anton Beloglazov
